---
id: describe-players
title: "DescribePlayers"
description: "Call this API to query all cloud player task lists under the AppID, including all statuses such as created, running, destroyed, etc.; or query the task information of a specified cloud player."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_player/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>DescribePlayers</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to query all cloud player task lists under the AppID, including all statuses such as created, running, destroyed, etc.; or query the task information of a specified cloud player.

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 20 times/second</Note>

## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Action","in":"query","description":"> API prototype parameter\n>\n> https://cloud-player-api.zego.im?Action=DescribePlayers\n","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["DescribePlayers"]},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"AppId","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. Application Id, a unique user credential assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. Signature version number.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"2.0","enum":["2.0"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Signature","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. <MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RoomId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 128 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":128,"description":"Query the specified room ID, with a length within 128 bytes.\n<b>If RoomId is filled in, please ensure that the RoomId exists, otherwise the query result may be empty.</b>\n\n> **Warning**\n>\n> - When neither RoomId nor PlayerId is filled in, calling this API will return all cloud player task lists under the AppId.\n> - When RoomId is filled in and PlayerId is not filled in, calling this API will return all cloud player task lists in the room RoomId under the AppId.\n> - When PlayerId is filled in (RoomId can be filled in or not), calling this API will return the cloud player task information corresponding to the PlayerId.\n","example":"room_12"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PlayerId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Cloud player unique identifier ID, returned by [CreatePlayer](/cloud-player-server/create-player).\n<b>If PlayerId is filled in, please ensure that the PlayerId exists, otherwise the query result may be empty.</b>\n\n> **Warning**\n>\n> - When neither RoomId nor PlayerId is filled in, calling this API will return all cloud player task lists under the AppId.\n> - When RoomId is filled in and PlayerId is not filled in, calling this API will return all cloud player task lists in the room RoomId under the AppId.\n> - When PlayerId is filled in (RoomId can be filled in or not), calling this API will return the cloud player task information corresponding to the PlayerId.\n","example":""}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PageSize"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Page size, value range (0, 50], default is 50 per page, indicating the maximum number of task lists returned by calling this API once.\n<b>For task lists exceeding the PageSize value, you need to call this API again for query based on the NextPageToken (query task list pagination starting position) value in the return result of the previous call to this API.</b>\n\nFor example, if there are currently 123 cloud player tasks and PageSize is 50, when calling this API for query:\n- The first time calling this API, pass empty for the input parameter PageToken, query player tasks 1 to 50; assume the NextPageToken value in the return result is \"pagetoken1\".\n- The second time calling this API, set the input parameter PageToken to \"pagetoken1\", query player tasks 51 to 100; assume the NextPageToken value in the return result is \"pagetoken2\".\n- The third time calling this API, set the input parameter PageToken to \"pagetoken2\", query player tasks 101 to 123; query completed, NextPageToken in the return result is empty.\n","example":50}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PageToken"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Query task list pagination starting position, <b>when this parameter is not filled in, the first page of the queried task list is returned by default.</b>\n\nEach time this API is called to initiate a request, NextPageToken will be returned in the response result, and developers need to determine whether the last page has been queried.\n","example":"XXXXXXXXX"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>

API.\n- 2: Idle state duration exceeded MaxIdleTime.\n- 3: Media resource playback has ended.\n- 4: Stream publishing failed.\n- 5: Failed to enter the room or was kicked out of the room.\n","enum":[1,2,3,4,5],"example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrlList"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined}
